PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10292021-12-17,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
Controlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Relating to Restricted Drugs (Special Access Program)
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATING TO RESTRICTED DRUGS (SPECIAL ACCESS PROGRAM) in order to (1) repeal the provisions in Part C of the Food and Drug Regulations that prohibit the authorization of the sale or importation of a restricted drug for the purposes of the Special Access Program; and (2) allow Health Canada the discretion to authorize the sale of restricted drugs for the purposes of emergency treatment through the Special Access Program, provided the application submitted by the practitioner meets all applicable requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0271 Publication Date: 2022-01-05
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Regulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATING TO RESTRICTED DRUGS (SPECIAL ACCESS PROGRAM) in order to (1) repeal the provisions in Part C of the Food and Drug Regulations that prohibit the authorization of the sale or importation of a restricted drug for the purposes of the Special Access Program; and (2) allow Health Canada the discretion to authorize the sale of restricted drugs for the purposes of emergency treatment through the Special Access Program, provided the application submitted by the practitioner meets all applicable requirements.
